law.catch_line: Hospitals, convalescent homes, mortuaries included in above restrictions.

text.section:
Sec. 31-73. Hospitals, convalescent homes, mortuaries included in above restrictions.
It shall be unlawful for any person to pay, offer to pay, receive, accept, take, or solicit the payment of any money, compensation, gratuity or other thing of value (commonly known as "turkey money"), for the purpose of inducing, seeking to induce, soliciting, or causing any person to patronize, use, or to be taken to any hospital, convalescent home, mortuary, or place of business, or for the purpose of diverting or attempting to divert any person from the hospital, convalescent home, mortuary, or place of business of his choice to another such establishment or place of business.
